# dateDecodingStrategy

**Instance Property**

The strategy used when decoding dates from part of a JSON object.

## Declaration

```swift
var dateDecodingStrategy: JSONDecoder.DateDecodingStrategy { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default strategy is the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/JSONDecoder/DateDecodingStrategy-swift.enum/deferredToDate] strategy.

## Decoding Dates

- **JSONDecoder.DateDecodingStrategy**: The strategies available for formatting dates when decoding them from JSON.
